first_para: Christopher 'Chris' James Skidmore FRHistS FSA MP (born 17 May 1981) is a British politician, author and historian.

full.extract:
Christopher 'Chris' James Skidmore FRHistS FSA MP (born 17 May 1981) is a British politician, author and historian.
He serves as the Conservative Member of Parliament (MP) for Kingswood, Gloucestershire, UK.
^ "Chris Skidmore MP". BBC Democracy Live. BBC. Retrieved 25 July 2010. 
^ London Gazette
full.title: Chris Skidmore
